description: CEFR sub-level framework for Aula PT. Each sub-level defines what a learner should know at that point. Tracked independently per section: conjugations, vocabulary, grammar.

A1.1.label: First verbs
A1.1.description: Can conjugate SER and ESTAR in the present tense. Understands the difference between the two.

A1.2.label: Essential irregular verbs
A1.2.description: Can conjugate TER, IR, and FAZER in the present tense.

A1.3.label: Core irregular verbs
A1.3.description: Can conjugate PODER, QUERER, DIZER, VER, DAR in the present tense.

A1.4.label: Regular -AR verbs
A1.4.description: Understands the regular -AR conjugation pattern in the present tense. Can conjugate FALAR, MORAR, TRABALHAR, GOSTAR, COMPRAR, CHAMAR, AJUDAR, PENSAR.

A1.5.label: Regular -ER/-IR and all present tense
A1.5.description: Understands -ER and -IR patterns. Can conjugate all verbs in the present tense with confidence.

A2.1.label: Past tense basics
A2.1.description: Can conjugate SER, ESTAR, TER, IR in the preterite (past simple).

A2.2.label: Preterite irregular verbs
A2.2.description: Can conjugate FAZER, DIZER, VER, DAR, SABER, VIR in the preterite.

A2.3.label: Preterite regular verbs
A2.3.description: Can form the preterite for all regular -AR, -ER, -IR verbs. Understands the patterns.

A2.4.label: Preterite confidence
A2.4.description: Can conjugate all available verbs in present and preterite. Can tell stories in the past.

A2.5.label: Present + Preterite mastery
A2.5.description: High accuracy on all verbs across present and preterite tenses. Ready for more complex tenses.

B1.1.label: Imperfect introduction
B1.1.description: Can conjugate SER, ESTAR, TER, IR in the imperfect. Understands when to use imperfect vs preterite.

B1.2.label: Imperfect + Future
B1.2.description: Can form the imperfect for all verb groups. Introduction to the future tense with regular verbs.

B1.3.label: Conditional
B1.3.description: Can form and use the conditional tense. Understands polite requests and hypothetical situations.

B1.4.label: Present Subjunctive
B1.4.description: Can form the present subjunctive. Understands common triggers (espero que, quero que, talvez).

B1.5.label: All tenses mastery
B1.5.description: Can conjugate all verbs across all 6 tenses with high accuracy. Ready for B2 content.

A1.1.label: First words
A1.1.description: Knows basic greetings: olá, bom dia, boa tarde, boa noite, adeus, obrigado, por favor, sim, não.

A1.2.label: Numbers and colours
A1.2.description: Knows numbers 1-20, basic colours, and time words like hoje, amanhã, ontem.

A1.3.label: Time and basic expressions
A1.3.description: Knows time-related vocabulary (hora, manhã, semana, mês) and daily expressions.

A1.4.label: Food and drink essentials
A1.4.description: Knows basic food and drink vocabulary: água, café, pão, carne, fruta. Can order at a restaurant.

A1.5.label: Everyday A1 vocabulary complete
A1.5.description: Knows all A1 vocabulary across basics and food/drink. Can handle basic daily situations.

A2.1.label: Getting around
A2.1.description: Knows basic travel words: aeroporto, comboio, autocarro, bilhete. Can ask for directions.

A2.2.label: Places and accommodation
A2.2.description: Knows places (praia, museu, farmácia, banco) and hotel vocabulary (quarto, reserva, chave).

A2.3.label: Home and family
A2.3.description: Knows rooms (cozinha, sala, quarto), furniture, and family members (mãe, pai, irmão).

A2.4.label: Daily routines and household
A2.4.description: Knows routine verbs (acordar, trabalhar, dormir) and household items (televisão, telemóvel, frigorífico).

A2.5.label: All A2 vocabulary complete
A2.5.description: Knows all A1+A2 vocabulary across all six categories. Solid foundation for daily life.

B1.1.label: Dining and cooking vocabulary
B1.1.description: Knows restaurant vocabulary (ementa, conta, guardanapo), cooking terms (cozinhar, ferver, assar), and flavour descriptions (picante, salgado, doce).

B1.2.label: Travel and cultural vocabulary
B1.2.description: Knows travel concepts (saudade, estrangeiro, alfândega, embaixada) and cultural terms (imperial, petisco).

B1.3.label: Advanced home and expressions
B1.3.description: Knows B1 household vocabulary (aspirador, sótão, cave, renda) and informal expressions (fixe, pois, pronto).

B1.4.label: Full vocabulary range
B1.4.description: Knows all available vocabulary across all categories and CEFR levels.

B1.5.label: Vocabulary mastery
B1.5.description: High accuracy on all vocabulary. Can use words in context with correct gender and natural phrasing.

A1.1.label: Gender and articles
A1.1.description: Understands masculine/feminine nouns and definite/indefinite articles (o/a, um/uma).

A1.2.label: Subject pronouns and SER vs ESTAR
A1.2.description: Knows all subject pronouns. Understands when to use SER vs ESTAR.

A1.3.label: Present tense formation
A1.3.description: Understands how to form the present tense for -AR, -ER, -IR regular verbs.

A1.4.label: Basic sentence structure
A1.4.description: Can form affirmative, negative, and question sentences. Understands word order.

A1.5.label: Prepositions and contractions
A1.5.description: Knows common prepositions (de, em, a, para, com) and their contractions (do, no, ao, pelo).

A2.1.label: Preterite tense formation
A2.1.description: Understands regular preterite formation for all verb groups. Knows common irregular preterite forms.

A2.2.label: Possessives and demonstratives
A2.2.description: Knows possessive adjectives (meu, teu, seu) and demonstratives (este, esse, aquele).

A2.3.label: Direct and indirect object pronouns
A2.3.description: Understands object pronouns (me, te, o/a, lhe) and their placement in sentences.

A2.4.label: Reflexive verbs and comparatives
A2.4.description: Can use reflexive verbs (levantar-se, vestir-se). Understands comparatives (mais...do que, menos...do que).

A2.5.label: A2 grammar mastery
A2.5.description: Confident with all A1+A2 grammar. Can construct varied sentences with correct pronouns, prepositions, and past tense.

B1.1.label: Imperfect tense and preterite vs imperfect
B1.1.description: Understands imperfect formation and when to use preterite vs imperfect.

B1.2.label: Future and conditional
B1.2.description: Can form the future and conditional tenses. Understands ir + infinitive vs synthetic future.

B1.3.label: Present subjunctive
B1.3.description: Understands subjunctive triggers (espero que, é preciso que, talvez). Can form the present subjunctive.

B1.4.label: Relative pronouns and connectors
B1.4.description: Can use que, quem, onde, o qual. Knows connectors (porque, embora, enquanto, por isso).

B1.5.label: B1 grammar mastery
B1.5.description: Confident with all grammar through B1. Can express opinions, describe experiences, and handle hypotheticals.

placementTest.description: Each section has an adaptive placement test. Questions start at A1.3 difficulty and adjust based on accuracy. 15 questions per section, results map to a sub-level.
